creator: egcs@21cn.com
text:
Hi,
    When I use mod_webapp.dll connectors(20010516) in Win2K with Apache
1.3.19 and Tomcat-4.0-20010516, no error reports by Tomcat or Apache,
but the browser is frozen,can you help me ?

I believe it's a threading issue due to the fact that Apache 1.3 under 
Windows is multi-threaded instead of being multi-process based as in 
Unix environments. (Digging into it)
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text:
Can you please try out the new build available toghether with Tomcat 4.0 
beta-7?
creator: pier@betaversion.org
pier@betaversion.org
text:
I'm marking this bug as a duplicate of 3509, as it seems to be due to the 
same multi-threading issue. Bug 3509 actually gives more information to 
be looked at.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3509 ***
